alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:01AM CDT until March 26 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Rankin County in central Mississippi... East central Hinds County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 300 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ridgeland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Madison around 310 AM CDT. Gluckstadt around 315 AM CDT. Fannin around 320 AM CDT. Goshen Springs around 330 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
